detail_desc: Top in soft jersey with short butterfly sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved jersey top and soft cotton flannel bottoms. Top with a print motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Elasticated scrunchie covered in satin with a sheen. Diameter approx. 12 cm.

Cropped, double-layered sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a cut-out section on one shoulder. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with appliqués on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Glittery Alice band with tulle and butterfly-shaped appliqués on top and a grosgrain lining.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups, a frill at the front and along the shoulder straps, and an adjustable metal hook fastening.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey containing glittery threads with a deep V-neck front and back, ties at the back of the neck and long sleeves. Lined.
Thin metal chain necklace decorated with small pendants. Adjustable length 42-49 cm.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Dungaree dress in soft, stretch organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and adjustable straps with press-studs. Soft brushed inside.
Short shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and decorative lace trims at the front and hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a text print. Bottoms with an all-over print and elasticated waist.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué on the front.
Fitted strappy top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Playsuit in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Ankle boots in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with pointed toes, a zip in one side and loop at the back. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester, and imitation leather insoles. Heel 7 cm.

Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in pattern-weave cotton with elastication and a flounce at the top. Opening with a button at the back, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Side pockets and ankle-length, tapered legs.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Metal rings in various designs.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping, pleated satin with a visible, elasticated, ribbed waistband. Lined.

Sporty hoodie in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs, and narrow elastication at the hem. The hoodie is made partly from recycled polyester.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in stretch twill with a zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a fake fly and regular waist with a decorative drawstring and elastication at the back. Side pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in pima cotton jersey. T-shirt with a round neck and button placket. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake fly.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of dungarees in soft cotton. Top in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder. Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with adjustable straps that fasten at the front, elastication at the back of the waist, a printed kangaroo pocket with appliqués, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with overlocked frill trims at the front and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flared legs.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and hem, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some mohair.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

V-neck playsuit in softly draping Tencel™ lyocell denim with buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Covered elastication and a tie belt at the waist, side pockets and short, wide legs.
Puff pants in a cotton weave with elastication and a frill trim at the waist and elasticated hems.
V-neck top in cool satin with lace at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.

Fully lined cargo trousers in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Flap front and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, fake back pockets with a decorative sewn-on flap, and shaped, tapered legs. Jersey lining.
Imitation leather sandals with a pompoms and glitter, an adjustable ankle strap with elastication and a metal buckle. Imitation suede linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Pyjamas in supersoft jersey. Top with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Wide, straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a yoke front and back, short sleeves with print stripes and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Cotton poplin shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fitted dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut at the top, a seam at the waist and a zip at the back. Unlined.

prod_name: Rachel or Merry HW Denim TRS
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Trousers in a patterned viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Trenchcoat in an airy weave made from a modal blend with notch lapels, buttons at the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs, side pockets, and a single back vent. Unlined.
Rib-necked T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey coloured with natural dyes.
Dress in soft, washed, patterned denim. Gathered yoke at the top with buttons at the back.
Elastic waist belt with a metal fastener. Width 4.5 cm.

Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Decorative straps at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Wide shirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front, long wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in imitation leather with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Short sleeves, a fake welt front pocket and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Short shirt dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke front and back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Rib-knit hat with an appliqué on the turned-up hem and a faux fur pompom at the top.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a small frill trim and sewn-on tie belt at the front. Side pockets and tapered legs.
Trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Hipster briefs in jersey with a low waist with a wide elastic waistband. Lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Trainers in suede with lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Jacket in Tencel™ lyocell twill with rounded lapels, a drawstring at the waist, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and long sleeves. Unlined.
Fancy dress costume in glossy, patterned velour with long sleeves, long legs and a deep neckline at the back.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with round toes and covered heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.

V-neck jumpsuit in woven fabric with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and a zip fly. Long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Seam and a wide belt at the waist, side pockets, and tapered, ankle-length legs with creases.
Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight, slightly wider legs.
Short T-shirt dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with matt press-studs on one shoulder, twisted seams at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers in stretch jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Imitation leather clutch bag with a flap and concealed magnetic fastener. Narrow imitation leather and metal chain shoulder strap and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 4x15x27 cm.
Sleeveless, fitted jumpsuit in stretch jersey with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and an open back with crossover straps.

Calf-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck opening with narrow ties at the top and frills. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Partly lined.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a press-stud.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Ankle boots with lacing at the front and fabric linings and insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Round-necked jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend.
